website_summaries.verdict: Sony's pricey, stylish Xperia S is packed with multimedia tricks but is undone by a slow processor and lackluster display.
pros: The Sony Xperia S flaunts an eye-catching design, Android 4.0, and a connection to Sony's large movie and music library
cons: The Xperia S has quirky capacitive buttons, slow 3G data, an uninspiring screen, and a pokey processor

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: With ICS, latest firmware update and Nova Launcher, it feels much much better now. Unlike Samsung GS3, this phone doesn't have latest CPU but I don't see any problem for daily task. And I think its design is better than any other phone, even better than latest Xperia T,TX, V.

customer_reviews.title: Like my phone . Me gusta mi telefono
customer_reviews.text: The only 2 thing i dont like about the phone is the battery is not long lasting and i cant get 4G/3G with SIMPLE MOBILE only have EDGE. But I like my Phone is very fast, never have trouble open any apps, the resolution on the screen is very good, both cameras . Dos cosas que no me gustan del telefono son la bateria no dura mucho,y no puedo tener 4G/3G con SIMPLE MOBILE solamente tengo edge. Pero me gusta mi telefono es rapido y nunca he tenido problemas en abrir ninguna apps, la resolusion de la pantalla es buena y ambas camaras.
customer_reviews.author: Rainer C.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PHONE EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used to have galaxy note and had to sell it due to its big size, but this was the perfect replacement phone everafter a good phone like galaxy note. I love it and I strongly recommend it, abd its so cheap comparing to its style and performance. I am so impressed with it.

customer_reviews.title: ok, but charger did not fit to the phone
customer_reviews.text: I am quite ok with the phone, but was very surprised when I could not plug the charger from the phone's box into the phone. Although it is an ordinary USB thing. It is not a very big problem, I use USB charges from my older staff, but it is the first time I see this and naturally no one accounts for this kind of things to happen. Main buttons (3 in the bottom) are not very responsible. advantages of the low end, so I said.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia S LT26i-WH Unlocked Phone with 12 MP Camera, Android 2.3 OS, Dual-Core Processor, and 4.3-Inch Touchscreen--U.S. Warranty (White)
product_meta.description:
The Sony Xperia S (also known as the Xperia HD or Nozomi) is the first device to be released under the Sony brand. Featuring a range of new features, the Xperia S is a handset that offers the latest in convergence technology.Debuting Sony’s ‘Iconic Identity’ design approach, the Xperia S sports a look that is instantly recognisable across all of the Xperia NXT series. A transparent element at the base of the phone creates an iconic silhouette, emphasizing and underlining the display. The element also integrates the phone’s antenna component and creates illumination effects. The Xperia S is the most powerful Sony handset released to date, featuring a 1.5GHz dual-core processor and 1GB of RAM. While there is no MicroSD slot, there is 32GB of internal storage and, with cloud storage becoming ever more important, we may see an offer similar to Box’s 50GB of free storage for Sony Ericsson devices that is currently available.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


(View Larger.) EXPERIENCE THRILLS. IN HD.
First day of the summer. Last day at the beach. Memories may fade, but the Sony Xperia S smartphone keeps them bright. Share the moment and video chat in HD.

Or record it all in full HD video. View in razor-sharp clarity on the stunning 4.3 inch HD Reality Display with Mobile BRAVIA Engine. Want more? Simply plug your Xperia S into your TV’s HDMI port and enjoy your content on a bigger screen.

EXPERIENCE NOW. WITH LIGHTNING-FAST CAPTURE.
A single key press takes you from sleep to snap in just over a second. With the 12 MP camera of Xperia S, you’ll never miss another shot again. And you can keep on shooting. No delays, no missing the subject. Low light? No worries. The Exmor R for Mobile camera sensor lightens up any gloomy day. Then share your pictures on a big screen. A single swipe on the display, and you can enjoy them on your tablet, TV or laptop via DLNA.

EXPERIENCE WINNING. ON AN ANDROID SMARTPHONE.
Xperia S is a PlayStation Certified smartphone, giving you a high quality mobile gaming experience. Enjoy a wide range of games on the fantastic HD display. Or easily connect to your TV and play on the big screen. Boredom is not an option.

EXPERIENCE BLISS. SONY ENTERTAINMENT NETWORK – ANYTIME, ANYWHERE.
Download a movie from Video Unlimited. Connect your smartphone to your TV and the TV launcher pops up automatically. Enjoy millions of songs from Music Unlimited. It’s all on Sony Entertainment Network and found with a common sign-on ID and digital wallet through your smartphone.

It’s the perfect fit for a life full of entertainment.

KEY FEATURES
 * 
 * Google Android 2.3, upgradeable to 4.0
 * 4.3-inch 720p HD Reality Display with Mobile BRAVIA Engine
 * Full 1080p HD video recording
 * Fast 12MP camera with Exmor R for mobile image sensor
 * 1.5 GHz dual core processor
 * PlayStation Certified
 * HDMI and DLNA
   
   VITAL STATISTICS
   The Xperia S weighs 5.08 ounces and measures 5.04 x 2.52 x 0.42 inches.
   
   
   
   
   
   
   ANDROID GINGERBREAD OPERATING SYSTEM
   The Xperia S runs the Android 2.3 operating system (dubbed Gingerbread). It features a cleaner, more refined interface with new icons, improved top notification bar, and more intuitive navigation. 
   
   Multitasking in Gingerbread allows you the ability to run more than one app at a time. If you're playing a game, you can easily switch to an incoming e-mail and then switch back to the game without losing your place. And like the previous version of Android ("Froyo"), Gingerbread provides support for Adobe Flash Player 10.1 for access to the full Web. 
   
   A new onscreen keyboard makes it easier to type thanks to additional spacing between the keys and larger font sizes. And the more you use the keyboard, the easier typing will be as the enhanced suggest feature records previous input history to make better suggestions.
   
   The Xperia S also brings one-touch access to the popular Google mobile services you use every day. It also provides easy access to both personal and corporate e-mail, calendars, and contacts supported by Exchange Server and Gmail. And through the Google Play store, you'll get access to thousands of useful applications, widgets, and fun games to download and install on your phone, with many more apps being added every day.
   
   GOOGLE INTEGRATION
    * Google Play store for browsing and downloading thousands of free and paid apps 
    * Pre-loaded Android apps: Browser, Calculator, Calendar (Google or Corporate), Camera, Clock, Contacts, Email, Gallery, Messaging, Music, News & Weather, Phone, Settings, Video Player, Voice Dialer, Voice Search, YouTube 
    * Google applications: Gmail, Google Search, Google Voice Search, Google Latitude, Google Maps, Google Places, Google Talk 
    * Google Maps Navigation with spoken turn-by-turn directions showing real-time traffic and 360° views of the destination 
   
   
   
   
   
   
   UNLOCKED PHONE
   This unlocked cell phone can be used with a GSM network service provider. It does not come with a SIM card, and it requires that you provide a SIM card for usage with your selected service provider. 
   
   This phone can be paired with 800/850/1800/1900 MHz UMTS/HSPA 3G networks in the United States (as well as 900/2100 MHz 3G networks found around the world, including in Europe and Asia). In areas not served by a 3G network, you'll continue to receive 2G data service via the EDGE network (depending on network compatibility).
   
   Note that the downloading of maps, games, music and videos and uploading of images and videos involves transferring large amounts of data. Your service provider may charge for the data transmission, and the availability of particular services and features may vary by carrier. 
   
   This phone comes with a full manufacturer's warranty (1-year).
feature_bullets: A transparent element at the base of the phone creates an iconic silhouette, emphasizing and underlining the display. The element also integrates the phone’s antenna component and creates illumination effects.
The most powerful Sony handset released to date, featuring a 1.5GHz dual-core processor and 1GB of RAM.

The Xperia S combines top of the range software and hardware to offer some outstanding features. A MicroHDMI port means that the handset is easy to connect to a TV and the handset itself can then be controlled using the TVs remote.
